ProjectAware.title: Social Media App
ProjectAware.description: The full-stack application AWARE offers features such as infinite loading, authentication, DMs, tagging, tracking trending hashtags, bookmarking, and more. For more information, click here.

ProjectArtStore.title: Art E-shop
ProjectArtStore.description: The e-shop is designed for selling art, clothing, AI art and more. Authentication, processing payments and storing data is done on the WixClient. For more information, click here.

ProjectNeuralNetwork.title: Neural Network Visualizer
ProjectNeuralNetwork.description: This project is a tool for visualizing and testing neural networks. I created it using Vite, React, and a new model from OpenAI - GPT-o1. For more info click here.
